Bit.Name: AUTO_TURN_ON
Bit.Description:
0: PMIC does not start automatically on VIN rising
1: PMIC starts automatically on VIN rising

Bit.Name: WDG_EN
Bit.Description: NVM Watchdog default value

Bit.Name: TMR_SET
Bit.Description: Watchdog timer duration default value

Bit.Name: VINOK_RISE
Bit.Description: VINOK_RISE threshold voltage

Bit.Name: VINOK_HYST
Bit.Description: VINOK_HYST threshold voltage

Bit.Name: PKEY_LKP_TMR
Bit.Description: PONKEYn long key press timer duration default value

Bit.Name: PKEY_LKP_FSLS
Bit.Description:
PONKEYn long key press allows the PMIC to go from the FAIL_SAFE_LOCK state to the OFF state
0: No effect
1: A PONKEYn long key press triggers a turn-off condition

Bit.Name: PKEY_LKP_OFF
Bit.Description: PONKEYn long key press turn-off condition default value

Bit.Name: RST_DLY
Bit.Description: RST release delay after POWER_UP sequence

Bit.Name: RANK_DLY
Bit.Description: power-up/power-down step (RANK) duration

low power mode (LP)
forced PWM mode (CCM)

Bit.Name: PKEY_FLT_CNT_MAX
Bit.Description: Setting of the maximum number of occurrences triggered by a PONKEYn long key press hard-fault source

Bit.Name: VIN_FLT_CNT_MAX
Bit.Description: Setting of the maximum number of occurrences triggered by a VIN falling below VINOK_Fall hard-fault source

Bit.Name: OCP_FLT_CNT_MAX
Bit.Description: Setting of the maximum number of occurrences triggered by regulator overcurrent hard-fault source

Bit.Name: TSHDN_FLT_CNT_MAX
Bit.Description: Setting of the maximum number of occurrences triggered by a thermal shutdown hard-fault source

Bit.Name: WDG_FLT_CNT_MAX
Bit.Description: Setting of the maximum number of occurrences triggered by a watchdog hard-fault source

Bit.Name: RST_FLT_CNT_TMR
Bit.Description: Setting of the maximum number of occurrences triggered by a thermal shutdown hard-fault source

Bit.Name: FAIL_SAFE_LOCK_DIS
Bit.Description: Disable fail-safe lock state (pass through)

Registers.Name: I2C_ADDR_SHR
Registers.Description: NVM I2C device address shadow register

Bit.Name: I2C_ADDR
Bit.Description:
PMIC I2C address
The content of this register take effect after the NVM programming command

Bit.Name: LOCK_NVM
Bit.Description:
NVM write access lock
The LOCK_NVM bit takes effect on both shadow registers write and NVM programming command

Bit.Name: NVM_USER1
Bit.Description:
User defined value
Free usage scratch registers save end-product application data in the NVM

Bit.Name: NVM_USER2
Bit.Description:
User defined value
Free usage scratch registers save end-product application data in the NVM
